abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Planning and Financial Management Capacity Building Program
            Project is to build capacity in the Ministry of Finance
            (MOF) strengthened for prudent, effective and accountable
            planning and management of public finances to promote growth
            and poverty reduction. The extension is necessary to start
            the implementation of MOF's Strategic Plan (SP), which
            was recently finalized after extensive work following the
            Mid-Term Review (MTR), to identify priority capacity
            development needs across MOF. The SP provides a detailed
            roadmap to strengthen MOF capacity for prudent, effective
            and accountable planning and management of public finances.
            The extension period will enable MOF to start preparations
            for any follow on program of support beyond November 2012,
            to be based on its SP. The extension also takes into account
            the need to provide a smooth transition during the
            presidential and parliamentary elections scheduled in 2012.
            The closing date of the project will be extended to November
            30, 2012. This will be the first extension of the project.
